attributes.action: Call upon the Football League and the Premier League to formally recognise the huge contribution that the original twelve members of the Football League have made to the game.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In these days where there is a growing media led feeling that football began with the Premiership there is a grave danger of people forgetting the all important origins of the game.
Whilst World Cup winners and European Cup winners proudly  sport their gold stars the twelve teams that made all of this possible remain largely  unrecognised.
The wearing of a replica of the original League Championship Cup on their shirt would draw peoples minds to the beginnings of the game wherever in the world the Original Twelve played.They and their supporters deserve it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
